front.title: IGP Flexible Algorithm with Deterministic Routing

abstract.t: IGP Flexible Algorithm proposes a solution that allows IGPs to compute constraint based paths over the network and specifies a way of using Segment Routing (SR) Prefix-SIDs, SRv6 locators, or pure IP prefixes to steer packets along the constraint-based paths. This document describes how to compute deterministic delay paths within a Flex-Algorithm topology.
